body:
Day 21 - 483*
The art was too simple to be appreciated and the book seemed more like a way for the author to put his masochism into something. Other than that not that memorable. Never coming back to this.
1/10.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me.
